-> This game comprises of a 9X9 Matrix that consists 9 - 3X3 TicTacToe Grids.

-> Assume these Sub-Grids, and also the blocks in each Sub-Grid are numbered from 1-9.

-> When one Player places his/her mark on on a certain 'i' block of any Sub-Grid, then the Next Player has to place his/her mark in the 'i' Sub-Grid of the Main Matrix

-> Once a Player wins in any Sub-Grid none of them can place X or O in that Sub-Grid.-> In this way whichever Player has more wins than the other in these 9 Sub-Grids is the WINNER!!!
